          <title>
            <string language="en">Convection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konvektion</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Convection</string>

          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of four illustrations showing convection current during heating of water. The warm water rises.</string>
          </description>

          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von vier Abbildungen, die 
Konvektionstrom während der Heizung des Wassers zeigen. Die 
warmen Wasseranstiege.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de quatre illustrations montrant 
le courant de convection pendant le chauffage de l'eau. Les 
élévations chaudes de l'eau.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de quatro ilustrações que mostram a 
corrente do convection durante o heating da água. As ascensões
mornas da água.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di quattro illustrazioni che 
mostrano la corrente di convezione durante il heating dell'acqua. 
Gli aumenti caldi dell'acqua.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερη τεσσάρων απεικονίσεων που εμφανίζουν ρεύμα 
μεταφοράς κατά τη διάρκεια του ζεστάματος του ύδατος. Οι 
θερμές άνοδοι ύδατος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de cuatro ilustraciones que 
muestran la corriente de la convección durante la calefacción del 
agua. Las subidas calientes del agua.</string>
